title: Update website domain to www.smartdesk7.com and add uploaded pamphlet + image to the site

requirements.text: Update the institute website domain everywhere it is displayed/linked to use exactly "www.smartdesk7.com" (replacing the previous value "www.smartdesk.in") using the centralized institute details content so the footer and Contact page website link update consistently.

quotes: change my website name as www.smartdesk7.com.

acceptanceCriteria: The website link shown in the Site Footer opens https://www.smartdesk7.com in a new tab.
The website link shown on the Contact page opens https://www.smartdesk7.com in a new tab.

requirements.text: Add the two user-uploaded images ("SDPH-1.jpg" pamphlet and "1000_F_755840623_3JuwWAI0IdvB5xOmCIqvUZmPyfLoHd3M-1.jpg") into the frontend as static assets and display them on the website in a dedicated section on the Home page.

quotes: and also add above both pamphlet and image in webisite

acceptanceCriteria: Both images are added to the repository under a public static path (e.g., frontend/public/assets/uploads/ or similar) and load correctly in the browser.
Home page includes a clearly labeled section that displays both images with appropriate alt text (English).
Images are responsive (fit on mobile/desktop without overflowing) and can be viewed at larger size (e.g., open in a new tab or via an in-page viewer/modal).

constraints: Backend must remain single-actor; do not introduce additional canisters/services.
Do not modify any files under frontend immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/components/ui/*).
Keep the website link format consistent with existing behavior (href uses https:// + domain and opens in a new tab).
nonGoals: No changes to Motoko backend logic or enquiry storage/retrieval.
No new authentication or third-party integrations.
No requirement to redesign the overall theme beyond what is necessary to place and style the new images section.
